task.name: imregrid
task.shortdescription: regrid an image onto a template image
task.description: Imregrid will regrid an input image onto a template image coordinate system. The input and template images must have the same coordinate structure.

param.name: imagename
param.description: Name of the image that needs to be regridded

param.name: template
param.description: Name of an image which is used as reference to provide shape and coordinate parameters of output image

param.name: output
param.description: Name of image which will store out put regridded image

task.example:
imregrid: regrid an image onto a template image:
Imregrid will regrid an input image onto a template image coordinate system. The input and template images must have the same coordinate structure.
Keyword arguments: imagename -- Name of the image that needs to be regridded default: none; example: imagename='orion.image' template -- Name of an image which is used as reference to provide shape and coordinate parameters of output image default: none; example: imagename='orion_vla.im' output -- Name of image which will store out put regridded image default: none; example: imagename='new_orion.im' async -- Run task in a separate process (return CASA prompt) default: False; example: async=True
